title: Mughal Miniature Series
description: A collection inspired by Persian and Mughal manuscript traditions, blending courtly narratives, sacred scenes, and richly detailed ornamental borders.

paintings.name: Al Khidar
paintings.materials: Gouache, gold leaf, handmade wasli paper
paintings.process: Layered washes, micro detailing, dry-brush textures
paintings.description: Depicts the mystical figure Al Khidar, guardian of hidden wisdom, guiding seekers toward spiritual awakening.

paintings.name: The Messenger
paintings.process: Wet-on-dry, dot detailing, layered petal strokes
paintings.description: Illustrates a royal envoy carrying sacred words and messages across kingdoms, embodying trust and divine duty.

paintings.name: The Hunt in Red Dawn
paintings.process: Wet-on-dry, dot detailing, layered petal strokes
paintings.description: A dramatic courtly hunt at sunrise, symbolizing valor, discipline, and the fleeting beauty of dawn.
